actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

official_title: To require generators of hazardous waste to treat or dispose of their waste at the site on which the waste was generated.

summary.text: Requires hazardous waste generators to treat, dispose, or recycle waste on the site on which the waste was generated.

titles.title: To require generators of hazardous waste to treat or dispose of their waste at the site on which the waste was generated.
